Context: To apply for an exchange program at George Brown College, students must be nominated by their home school and confirm their eligibility by checking the exchange partner schools list. The exchange gives students the opportunity to study in Toronto and pay tuition to their home school while enjoying the benefits of studying at George Brown. Academic credits are transferable upon successful completion. Interested students should contact their home institution's international department for application information. Application deadlines, college news, and events can be signed up for on the website. Contact information: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@geborne.ca. The information contained in the website is subject to change without notice.
